topic.title: 13.4.5 Three or More Signal Control Timing

header.para: Three or More Signal Control Timing

body.para: When three or more sets of input/output signals are assigned to the same group, all the signals are controlled by M code commands from any signal set in the group.
Three signal controls are described below with an example case in which three signals USDO1/USDI1 ~ USDO3/USDI3 are controlled with M580 and M581.
